text: Edward Thomas Butler (8 May 1957 â€“ 15 September 2022) was a Welsh journalist, sports commentator, and Welsh rugby union player. He played for the Wales national rugby union team team between 1980 and 1984 and scored 2 tries. Butler was known for his support of Welsh independence. Butler died peacefully in his sleep at while at a camp during a hiking trip in Cusco in the Andes mountains in Peru at the age of 65. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Welsh journalists Category:Welsh rugby union players Category:Sports commentators
